item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kavingar with Brother A.L. Srinivasan- Film producer and Film Chamber President five terms.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kavingar’s 50th Birthday celebrations in Madurai. It was organised by Mr.Nedumaran, standing next to him.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: M.G.R and Kavingar were great friends and also on certain political grounds, they differed. But the sincerity to each other was well known. All the songs of M.G.R were hits.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: M.R.Radha- a good friend as well as well wisher of Kavingar. He acted in Kavingars’ ‘Kavalai Illatha Manithan’ film.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kavingar had many functions and meetings.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: KANNADHASAN MANIMANDABAM- Karaikudi has Kavingar’s photos, and library and also hosts meetings on Kavingar.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Mrs. Parvathi Kannadhasan- She was the back bone of Kavingar. Took care of the house and was a fantastic culinary expert.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Rare photo:Sitting From Left: Kavingar’s sister’s daughter Manimegalai, Ponnammal Kannadhasan,Center Kavingar’s Sister Kannamai Aachi, Vallikannu, And Parvathi Kannadhasan. STANDING: Kavingar’s Sister Sornam, Muthu her husband, Somasundaram Chettiar husband of Kannammai Aachi, Karaikudi Assistant Anjezhuthu

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Moods of Kavingar are well known.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: He loves to pose for camera.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Nowadays all these photographs convey a meaning.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: That is the way he thinks. Look at the eyes.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: His favourite leader Kamarajar

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: This Poet used to write, when he has the option. But always it was dictated. He had the speed in both. His favorite chair is in the Kannadhasan Pathippagam.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: At the wedding of his daughter, with the then Hon. C.M. Kalaingar Karunanithi and Minister Mr.Sadhik Batcha.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kavingar was a foodie. He loved to eat. Variety but in small quantity. A dinner in Malaysia.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The one real HERO Kavingar admired and the one and only KAVINGAR , M.G.R. admired. Kavingar wrote story, screen play ,dialogue and some songs for seven films of M.G.R.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Making the poet as POETLAUREATE . The Honourable C.M. M.G.R. announces the proposal of his Government to nominater Kavingar as ARASAVAIK KAVINGAR. At the wedding reception of his son Gandhi Kannadhasan

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The one and only actor, Kavinagr introduced in films. Manorama Aachi- Balachander, The Great had said all his introduced heroes and heroines are good but cannot match the one Kannadhasan introduced.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the Russian Poet, when Kavingar was the President of Indo- Soviet Cultural Society.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Catch them young ! Director Sridher, Sivaji, Chandrababu, M.S.V and Kavingar. Films that ran for 100 days in ten theaters only celebrated the function.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: This App is a gift to you. Where can you see such young Sivaji, Kannadhasan. M.S.Viswanathan and Ramamoorthy. At the film PASAMALAR 25th week celebrations. The picture ran in 67 theaters in All over Tamil Nadu.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Friends and Foes – They were so close that became their bond that was not seen by all. They fought and yet they were good friends.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The C.M and the King of Poets.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kannadhasan’s contribution to the growth of DMK is well known among the elderly. But this generation to know, this picture will help.Kannadhasna with MGR, Kalaingar, Anbil Dharmalingam and Mathiyalagan.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Only Kannadhasan must write my films songs, Sivaji used to say. Can you feel the closeness they have?

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The swearing in ceremony of Kavingar as ARASAVAIK KAVINAGR in Rajaji Hall.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: The songs of Kannahdasan. A visual treat to see the composing of songs. He will deliver the lyrics as soon as the tune is given. With Music Director K.V.Mahadevan, Director G.R.Nathan and dialogue Writer Valampuri Somanathan.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the Russian Poets.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the Central Minister of Information and Broadcasting Mr.Ragunath Reddy. Kannahdhasan was the bridge between the Governements. Many Ministers were his friends and he spent for them.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Lyrics to tune OR Tune the lyrics. It was easy for both Kavingar and Mellisai Mannar M.S.V.Can you see the height difference

item.title: Nill
item.desc: 1976, the 50th Birthday Celebrations of Kavinagr in Madurai. Mr.Nedumaran of Congress made a great function. And you can see the Vallal Chinnappa Devar and Music Directors Shankar Ganesh.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Gandhi Kannadhasan wedding reception. The CM attends.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: At the function of Attaukkara Alamelu. CM. R.M.Veerappan and Chinnappa Devar and Kannadhasan in consultation. That is how MGR ties [tightens] his Veshti.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: They both came out of DMK due the power struggle and back biting. Both were not after anything but Annadorai. These two were more popular and next to Anna. Read it all in Kavingar’s book VANAVASAM.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar created many directors. Among them, Madurai Thirumaran is one.Mrs. Paravthi Kannadhasan’s sister’s daughter was married to Thirumaran. And the wedding and the reception at Woodlands Hotel was conducted by Kavinagr. You can see Gandhi Kannadhasan at the rights side corner and in the middle is Annadorai Kannadhasan, in suite.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Do you know that Kannadhasan conducted and took the Thaali and gave it to Sivaji to tie on Kamala Amma ,in the wedding? An honour that was bestowed by the Family of Sivaji on the Poet for the gift of his poesy. Here with MGR and Kalaingar at the Wedding.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: KARUPPUPANAM- a film none of the heroes wanted to act. A s it dealt with the Black Money laundering. So, Kavingar acted as the hero cum good villain. A Robin Hood style story. See the film in TV- shown regularly- you can see how majestic he walks and sweet he delivers his dialogues.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: More than his Gods, Kavinagr loved his Mother and Father. This photo adorns, even now, in his bed room. Kavinagr will wake up looking at this picture and will not see any one till then. His Mother VISALKAKSHI and Father SATHAPPAN

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Photo apps ,with comments compiled and presented by Gandhi Kannadhasan, son of the Poet.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Do you remember ‘ULLATHIL NALLA ULLAM’ song? That was sung by this singer Sirgazhli Govindarajan. Honored by Raj Sir Muthiah Chettiyar.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Thanks! Kannadhasan used to call MGR as SAAMI. A passionate calling and MGR love it.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: A profile of Kavingar.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Daily Thanthi , a daily started by Adhithanar was Kavingar’s favourite news paper.Mr. Sivanthi Aadhithan succeeded and he was a close friend of Kannadhasan. This kind of unusual request Kaviingar will do for friends only.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: At Sivanthi Aadhithan’s office with Editor and good friend Mr.Shanmuganathan. He still remains the best friend of the Family of Kavingar.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: A great picture. Kamalahasan celebrated his 100th film. And wanted to thank all who were with him.The shield says ‘NANDRI’. CM M.G.R and Kavingar presided over the function.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Vijaya Fims and Studios owner Mr.Nagi Reddi , a Telugu man, was a great admirer of Kannadhasan. His Sivaj starrer was Vasantha maligai. And MGR starrer was Enga Veettu Pillai.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: No film Lyricist then and now had that much friends in Politics. Kannadhasan was a King among poets even with the political circles. The respect came as no surprise as Kannadhasan’s pen was mightier than sward.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar’s favorite film team. Director Sridhar with MSV in Sumaithangi film composing at Chtralaya’s office.Co- producer Kovai Chezhiyan is also seen.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Sampath and Kannadhasan.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Repeat

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: The fight against Chinese aggressors. Kavingar was the given to lead a team of artists and musicians to the border to entertain our Jawans. They all went to Thanlaivar Kamaraj’s house.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: “SERAMAN KAADHALI” - got him the SAHITYA ACADEMY AWARD. Interestingly this historical novel was written by Kavingar at the initiation of Kanchi MAHA PERIYAVA. His blessings was always with Kavingar.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Can you see the look in his eyes? His concentration is great when he answer you.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Supre Star Rajini. The film Aarilirunthu Aarubathu Varaai 100 days function.You can never see a photo of Super Star touching the feet of the other. He always loved the Tamil and lyrics of Kavingar and admired him. A great picture to speak in the future also.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kavingar poses without any inhibition. Always casual.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: L.R.Eswari Singing in a Temple. She is known for her Amman songs.Kavingar presides over.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: CHO- acted in Kavingar produced movies. He was a great friend. He interviews Kavingar for Kumudham. This interview is in the book KANNADHASAN PETTIGAL.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: VANAVASAM - popular edition was brought out by Kavingar himself. This edition was released by Thalaivar Kamaraj.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar’s first wedding. Mrs. Ponnammal Kannadhasan. Traditional attire.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The Maharaja ! With his wives Parvathi and Ponnammal. They all lived as ‘One Happy Family’.With all the children in the same house.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: The friend. Sivanthi Aadhithyan of Dinathanthi. Receives Kavingar when Kavingar went to their office.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Pulavar Naga.Shanmugam was his friend.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Nill
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: With his ever loving Thambi. Mellisai Mannar M.S.V. A rare color still taken for the BOMMAI = TAmil cinema magazine.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Honoring Viswanathan - Ramamoorthy. Must be PASAMALAR film. AS all of them are young.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: When Kavingar went to Russia. He wrote poems on the Russians. With the dance group, that performed for the ISCUS delegation.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Friendship was always love and fight. These two greats remained that way.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The family that live together love each other. This photo in the 1960’s show how Kavingar lived with all his children and two wives in one house at Kannadhasan Salai.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: God has descended to see the composing of Kavingar. That is what other language Lyricists say about Kavingar. This is one such moment.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Russian Poet and Kavingar.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With Fr.George and Fr.Stanislas in Trichy. Kavingar wrote YESU KAAVIYAM in two weeks and the effort and support of these two Reverends is commendable.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Nill
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: REPEAT

item.title: Nill
item.desc: ‘Ulaga Nayagan’ Kamal Hassan wanted to thank the film industry for the 100 films he completed. The then CM and The Poet Laureate of his Government. In a serious discussion on the stage. The memento on the table speak ample about Kamal Sir.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Mount Road GPO. Kavingar leads the protest against State Government.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: WRONG STILL

item.title: Nill
item.desc: WRONG STILL

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar’s hand writing. For a film company he had written this. After 1960. Kavingar dictated lyrics to his first assistant Panchu Arunachalam. And that went till last.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the CM Mr.Bakthavatchalam and the former CM Thalaivar Kamaraj. Kavingar demand the most respect in the political circles.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With his grandson Kartheck Kannadhasan. Gandhi Kannadhasan’s son. Whenever Kavingar had time, he would play with his grandson. Age was no bar to the Poet

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The then Governor Mr.Prabudas Patwari. And with ‘Vanathi’ Thirunavukkarasu.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: More of Kavingar with the Thalaivar

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Thalaivar Kamaraj, Central Minister VK Krishna Menon, Raja Sir Muthiah Chettiar. E.V.K. Sampath, Minister Poovaragavan. Occasion and location not available.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With Thalaivar and Nadigar Thilagam on stage.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With his favourite leader.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: During the regime of MGR as CM, he made Kavingar as the Poet Laureate of the Tamil Nadu Government. This post was vacant for more than three decades after Sri.Namakkal Ramalinagam Pillai. This car was given by the Government for Kavingar TMY 5050.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: A colored portrait.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: PASAMALAR celebrated 25 weeks. The fans celebrated it all over Tamil Nadu. The actors and the Technicians and Kavingar were always part of it. They respected their audience that much. With Sivaji and Savirithri.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Same stage. With Sivaji, Gemini Ganesan, Director Sridhar, Chandra Babu and Savitri.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Not sure of the occasion.With Kamaraj are KAvingar, A.L.S, Sivaji, Padmini, J.Jayalitha, Rajasulochana, Padmini and P.Suseela

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the Pulavar Tamil Kanal attending a meeting in a college in Tirunelveli.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Brothers. Same height, fair and spotlessly dressed, most respected in the Tamil and Indian Film Industry. A gifted birth.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With the Russian Poets.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kannadasan with His wife Parvathi Kannadhasan. They were the greatest hosts to all their relatives and friends. Amma was the back bone of Kavingar, who took all the loads of the house. So Kavingar was free in his mind and body.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kannadasan with His wife Poornimal Kannadhasan. A great human being.At the Kannadasan Salai house, you can see the names of these two wives embedded on the enterance.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Sometimes he used to proof correct his Tamil literary magazine KANNADHASAN.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The cove of the KANNADHASAN KATHAI- a biography of Kavingar came as a serial in Rani Weekly and later as a book.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: A real photogenic.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: At the Cresent Park road house, in T.Nagar. Next to the Kannadhasan Salai property. Kavingar with Gandhi and Parvathi with Kamal.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Rarely you see him with the colored shirt.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Colored picture

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kannadasan, M.G.R at his Son Gandhi Kannadasan’s wedding reception.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Posing for still came naturally.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Great photo. Kavingar smile is different from others. Slight tilt of the lips to the left can be seen.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: His favourite pastime reading . He used to in his room.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: In his room in Kannadhasan salai house.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With ‘Paavendar’ BHARATHIDASAN. He and Kavingar were friends as well as foes. Paavendar was against DMK and had difference of opinion.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: With ‘MozhiGnayiru’ Devaneyapa Paavaanar – Kavingar was given a equal seat in all the Literary Meetings. His elders appreciated the talent in him.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: With the Actor M.R.Radha- who also acted in Kavingar’s films. Also political friends.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: POSES and POSES

item.title: Nill
item.desc: CM MGR and Kavingar at the Arasavaik Kavingar installation function.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Thinker.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Poses came to him naturally.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Repeated again. Yes, only to show how much Kavingar was appreciated by the Leaders of yester years. On par with them on stage. A cinema industry man could not achieve this on those days.Kavingar was unique.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Thanthai Periyar was the founder of all DMKs. They all came out of his DK party.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With EVK Sampath.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: With the legend JAYAKANTHAN aka JK. These two great writers were very close friends.JK came to Congress because of Kavingar.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: A profile.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: In Rani Chinnammal Road - Film Production Office

item.title: Nill
item.desc: In Kavitha Hotel. Where he used to compose many, many songs.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar acted in many dramas. All of them Political propaganda and was in favour with the then Congress party. Six dramas were performed by him and he had his own troupe. With Shanmugasundaram in the KONIPPULUGAN GOYABELS.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Karuppupanam. Film still.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar posing for a still.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: The Guru and the Student.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: On stage with his last son Venkatachalam.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Sri Kirupanantha Variar was Kavingar’s spiritual Guru. He had a special place. He would always attend the lectures of Variar Swamigal.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: With CM Kalaingar and ALS.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: Kamaraj never celebrated his birthdays. But Kavingar would always request him to cut the cake. Thalaivar would always oblige as he liked Kavingar that much.

item.title: Kannadasan Pathipagam
item.desc: He had his own news papers – THENDRAL - THENDRAL TIRAI – Alaiosai was his favorite and he wrote for that daily.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: Kavingar and his favorite cot.

item.title: Nill
item.desc: A Still to remember……… Kavingar writing on his pad.
